visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: 'Tokyo' with data [7.0, 6.9, 9.5, 14.5, 18.2, 21.5, 25.2, 26.5, 23.3, 18.3, 13.9, 9.6] and 'London' with data [3.9, 4.2, 5.7, 8.5, 11.9, 15.2, 17.0, 16.6, 14.2, 10.3, 6.6, 4.8]. The chart should have custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes two data series: 'Tokyo' and 'London', each with monthly temperature data. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The chart has a light gray background and custom margins to ensure the title and axis labels are clearly visible. The legend is styled with a white background and a light gray border, and the series are colored green and blue for distinction. This configuration ensures a clean and informative visualization of the monthly average temperatures for the two cities.
